channel.title: scheme on YOJNA PORTAL 2025 - Govt Schemes & Sarkari Job Updates Daily
channel.description: Recent content in scheme on YOJNA PORTAL 2025 - Govt Schemes & Sarkari Job Updates Daily

item.title: BHEL Artisan Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: Bharat Heavy Electricals Limited (BHEL) has announced 515 vacancies for Artisan Grade IV posts under various trades such as Fitter, Welder, Turner, Machinist, Electrician, Electronics Mechanic, and Foundryman for the year 2025. These vacancies are spread across multiple BHEL units like BAP, HPVP, HEEP, TP, and others. Candidates must have passed Class 10th along with ITI (NTC) and NAC in the respective trade. A minimum of 60% marks is required for General and OBC candidates, and 55% for SC/ST in both qualifications. This recruitment offers a great opportunity for skilled ITI holders to join one of India’s leading public sector enterprises.

item.title: Chandigarh High Court Reader (Legal) Vacancy 2025
item.description: The Punjab and Haryana High Court, Chandigarh has invited online applications for 60 posts of Reader (Legal). Eligible candidates must have 10+2 with 60% marks in English, an LL.B. degree, and computer proficiency. The selection process includes a written exam, computer proficiency test, and viva-voce. The application process is open from 14 July 2025 to 04 August 2025. Candidates are advised to check the official notification for detailed eligibility, syllabus, and instructions.

item.title: Chandigarh High Court Peon Vacancy 2025
item.description: Chandigarh High Court has invited online applications for 75 posts of Peon (Residential). Eligible candidates with 10th pass qualification, 1-year diploma in cooking/culinary arts, and 3 years of cooking experience can apply from 14 July to 4 August 2025 at www.highcourtchd.gov.in. Applicants from all states are eligible, but reservation and fee relaxation are available only for residents of Punjab, Haryana, and Chandigarh. Selection will be based on a practical test (80 marks) and interview (20 marks). Application fee is ‚Çπ700 for general and ‚Çπ600 for reserved categories.

item.title: SSC Selection Post Phase 13 Examdate Notice 2025
item.description: The Staff Selection Commission (SSC) has released the official notification for Selection Post Phase 13 Recruitment 2025, offering a total of 2,423 vacancies across various government departments and ministries. This recruitment drive is open to candidates with Matric (10th), Intermediate (12th), and Graduation level qualifications.

item.title: West Bengal WBSSC Assistant Teacher Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: The West Bengal Central School Service Commission (WBSSC) has released a notification for the recruitment of 35,726 Assistant Teachers for classes 9 to 12 in government schools. Eligible candidates with a minimum of 50% marks in Graduation/Post Graduation and a B.Ed or equivalent degree can apply online within the specified dates.

item.title: UPPSC Assistant Teacher Bharti 2025
item.description: The Directorate of Medical Education and Research (DMER) has announced a recruitment drive for 7466 Assistant Teacher posts. Candidates must hold a Bachelor‚Äôs Degree in the relevant subject from any recognized university in India. Detailed eligibility criteria and subject-wise qualifications will be released soon. Interested applicants are advised to stay updated with the official notification and prepare to apply online as per the given schedule.

item.title: MHA Intelligence Bureau ACIO Vacancy 2025
item.description: The Intelligence Bureau (IB), under the Ministry of Home Affairs (MHA), has announced the recruitment of 3717 posts for Assistant Central Intelligence Officer (ACIO) Grade-II / Executive. This is a Group ‘C’, Non-Gazetted, and Non-Ministerial post offering candidates a prestigious opportunity to work with India‚Äôs internal intelligence agency. Applicants must possess a Bachelor‚Äôs Degree in any stream from a recognized university in India. The selection process involves a written examination followed by an interview. Eligible candidates can apply online through the official MHA website.

item.title: SIDBI Assistant Manager Grade A & B Vacancy 2025
item.description: Small Industries Development Bank of India (SIDBI) has released the official notification for the recruitment of Assistant Manager Grade A (General) and Manager Grade B (General, Legal, IT) posts, with a total of 76 vacancies. This is a great opportunity for candidates holding a Bachelor‚Äôs or Master‚Äôs degree in fields like Commerce, Economics, Law, Engineering, Management, or related disciplines. A minimum of 5 years of relevant experience is required for all Grade B positions. The application process will be conducted online, and the postings will be pan-India. Interested candidates are advised to visit the official website www.sidbi.in to check complete details and apply. For eligibility criteria, experience requirements, and selection procedure, please refer to the official notification.

item.title: Indian Airforce Agniveervayu Intake 02/2026 Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: The Indian Air Force has released the notification for Agniveervayu Intake 02/2026 under the Agnipath Scheme. Eligible male and female candidates can apply online for the Agniveer Vayu post. The recruitment is open to candidates from both science and non-science backgrounds. Selection will be based on an online test, physical fitness test, and medical examination.

item.title: Jharkhand SSC ANM Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: The Jharkhand Staff Selection Commission (JSSC) has released the official notification for the recruitment of Female Health Workers (A.N.M.) under the Regular and Backlog vacancies for the year 2025. A total of 3,181 posts are available, including 3,020 regular and 161 backlog vacancies. Only female candidates who are domicile of Jharkhand and have completed 10th (Matric) with at least 45% marks, along with 18 months A.N.M. training and registration in Jharkhand State Nursing Council, are eligible to apply. The application process will be conducted online through the official JSSC website. Interested and eligible candidates must read the official notification thoroughly and apply within the specified dates.

item.title: RBI Officers Grade A & B Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: Reserve Bank of India (RBI) has announced 28 vacancies for various Grade A and B Officer posts under the 2025 recruitment drive. The available posts include Law Officer, Manager (Technical ‚Äì Civil and Electrical), Assistant Manager (Rajbhasha), and Assistant Manager (Protocol & Security). Candidates applying for these positions must meet the minimum educational qualifications such as LLB, BE/B.Tech, Master‚Äôs Degree, or have military experience, along with relevant work experience where required. This is a great opportunity for eligible candidates to join the RBI as an officer and contribute to the nation‚Äôs central banking system. Interested applicants can submit their applications through the official RBI website within the given deadline.

item.title: Rajasthan Police Constable 2025 New Examdate
RSSB Lab Attendant Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: The Rajasthan Staff Selection Board (RSSB) has released the notification for Lab Attendant (Prayogshala Sahayak) Recruitment 2025. Eligible candidates can apply online through the official website. This recruitment is a great opportunity for 10th pass candidates seeking government jobs in Rajasthan. Applicants must have a valid domicile of Rajasthan to claim reservation benefits; candidates from other states can apply under the unreserved category (UR). The selection process will include a written examination followed by document verification. Interested candidates are advised to read the official notification carefully and apply before the last date.

item.title: SSC Combined Graduate Level Exam 2025- Correction/edit form 2025
Indian Army SSC Tech Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: The Indian Army has released the short notification for SSC Technical Entry 66th Course for Men and Women. A total of 379 vacancies are available, including 350 for men and 29 for women. The course will commence in April 2026 at Officers Training Academy (OTA), Chennai. Candidates with a Degree in Engineering (B.E. / B.Tech) in relevant disciplines are eligible to apply. The online application process will begin on 16 July 2025 and continue until 14 August 2025 through the official website joinindianarmy.nic.in. This is a great opportunity for aspiring engineers to join the Indian Army as Short Service Commission Officers.

item.title: SBI CBO 2025 Exam Date/ Admitcard
CSBC Bihar Police Constable Admitcard Available 2025
item.description: CSBC Bihar Police Constable Recruitment 2025 Central Selection Board of Constable CSBC Short Details of Notification Bihar Police Advt No. : 01/2025 Important Dates Application Begin: 18/03/2025Last Date for Apply Online: 25/04/2025Pay Exam Fee Last Date: 25/04/2025Exam Date: 16/07/2025 to 03/08/2025Admit Card Available: 09/07/2025 Admit Card Available : 7 July 2025 (10 Days before Exam)Exam date: 13 July to 6 August 2025 Application Fee General / OBC / EWS / Other State: 675/-SC / ST: 180/-Pay the Examination Fee Through Debit Card, Credit Card, Net Banking or Pay Offline Fee Payment Through E Challan Mode Only Eligibility Age Limit DetailsMinimum Age: 18 Years.

item.title: Indian Coast Guard Assistant Commandant AC Vacancy 2025
item.description: The Indian Coast Guard has released the notification for Assistant Commandant Recruitment 2025. A total of 170 vacancies are available under two main branches: General Duty (GD) with 140 posts and Technical (Engineering/Electrical) with 30 posts. Eligible male candidates with a graduate degree and Physics & Maths at 10+2 level can apply for GD, while candidates with an engineering degree in relevant disciplines can apply for the Technical branch. The application process is online through the official website joinindiancoastguard.cdac.in. This is a prestigious Group ‚ÄòA‚Äô Gazetted Officer post under the Ministry of Defence, Government of India.

item.title: BPSC Lower Division Clerk LDC Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: The Bihar Public Service Commission (BPSC) has released a notification for the recruitment of Lower Division Clerk (LDC) posts with a total of 26 vacancies. Candidates who have passed Intermediate (10+2) in any stream from a recognized board and possess computer operation and typing skills are eligible to apply. This recruitment is primarily for domicile candidates of Bihar, who will receive reservation benefits as per their category. Candidates from other states can also apply but will be considered under the General (Unreserved) category only, without any reservation or age relaxation. The application process is completely online. Out of the total posts, 13 are for General, 3 for EWS, 4 for SC, 1 for ST, 2 for EBC, 2 for BC, and 1 for BC Female.

item.title: IOB Local Bank Officer 2025 Admit Card Donwnload
DSSSB 2025: Apply for Various Posts
item.description: DSSSB Various Post Recruitment 2025 has been announced for multiple vacancies in different departments under the Delhi Government, including posts like Malaria Inspector, Ayurvedic Pharmacist, PGT Teachers, Warder, Technician, and Laboratory Assistant. The minimum qualification ranges from Class 10th pass to Master‚Äôs degree, with specific experience and course requirements depending on the post. Eligible candidates from any state in India can apply online through dsssbonline.nic.in from 8th July 2025 to 7th August 2025. The job postings will be within Delhi only. The exam dates and admit cards will be released as per schedule, so applicants should read the official notification carefully and submit their applications before the last date.

item.description: Combined Defence Services (CDS) II Exam 2025

item.title: Bihar Home Guard Result Declared 2025
item.description: Bihar Home Guard Recruitment 2025 Bihar Home Guard Department Short Details of Notification Bihar HG Advt No. : 01/2025 Important Dates Application Begin: 27/03/2025Last Date for Apply Online: 16/04/2025Pay Exam Fee Last Date: 16/04/2025Exam Date: 30/04/2025 to 05/06/2025Admit Card Available: 24/04/2025 Result Available: 04/07/2025 Application Fee General / OBC / EWS: 200/-SC / ST: 100/-All Category Female: 100/-Pay the Examination Fee Through Debit Card, Credit Card, Net Banking or Pay Offline Fee Payment Through E Challan Mode Only Eligibility Age Limit as on 01/01/2025Minimum Age: 19 Years.

item.title: Indian Navy Civilian INCET Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: The Indian Navy has released the INCET 01/2025 notification for the recruitment of 1097 civilian posts under Group B and Group C categories across various naval commands. Eligible candidates can apply online through the official website for posts like Chargeman, Tradesman Mate, Fireman, Pharmacist, Storekeeper, MTS, and more. The selection process includes a written exam and document verification. Applicants must check post-wise qualifications, age limits, and category-wise vacancies before applying.

item.title: JPSC Assistant Public Prosecutor APO Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: Jharkhand Public Service Commission (JPSC) has released the notification for 134 vacancies of Assistant Public Prosecutor (APO) for the year 2025. Candidates holding a Bachelor‚Äôs Degree in Law (LLB) from any recognized university in India are eligible to apply. The selection process will include written examinations and interviews. Interested candidates can apply online within the specified application dates. Category-wise vacancies are available for UR, BC-I, BC-II, EWS, SC, and ST candidates. For complete eligibility criteria and application details, refer to the official notification.

item.title: BTSC Bihar Nursing Tutor Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: The Bihar Technical Service Commission (BTSC) has released a notification for the recruitment of 498 Nursing Tutors under the Health Department, Government of Bihar. Candidates holding M.Sc Nursing, B.Sc Nursing (Basic/Post Basic), or a Diploma in Nursing Education & Administration (DNEA) are eligible to apply. The selection process includes eligibility verification and document scrutiny as per INC and Bihar Nursing Council norms. 35% of the vacancies are reserved for female candidates. Interested and eligible candidates can apply online through the official BTSC website within the given time frame.

item.title: Bihar PCS 71st Online Form 2025 | Exam date Out
BOB Local Bank Officers LBO Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: Bank of Baroda (BOB) has announced 2500 vacancies for the post of Local Bank Officer (JMG/S-I) across multiple states. Candidates must hold a graduation degree in any discipline from a recognized university. Professional qualifications like CA, Engineering, or Medical are also accepted. Applicants must have at least 1 year of experience as an officer in a Scheduled Commercial Bank or Regional Rural Bank listed under the Second Schedule of the RBI. Experience in NBFCs, cooperative banks, and fintechs will not be considered. The recruitment is open state-wise with preference for candidates familiar with the local language.

item.title: IBPS Hindi Officer Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: The Institute of Banking Personnel Selection (IBPS) has released the notification for Hindi Officer (Rajbhasha Adhikari) Recruitment 2025 under Specialist Officer (SO) cadre. Eligible candidates with a Master‚Äôs degree in Hindi or English with the relevant language combination can apply online through the official IBPS website. The application process includes registration, form filling, and fee payment. Applicants are expected to have desirable translation experience in a banking or financial institution and proficiency in MS Word and Excel. The online registration, eligibility criteria, important dates, and complete details are available in the official notification. Interested candidates are advised to apply within the given timeline.

item.title: Indian Navy Agniveer MR Musician Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: The Indian Navy has invited online applications for the post of Agniveer MR Musician 2025. Candidates must have passed Class 10 (Matric) with at least 50% marks and possess musical ability as specified in the official notification. The physical fitness test includes a 1.6 km run, squats (uthak baithak), push-ups, and bent knee sit-ups with separate benchmarks for male and female candidates. Interested aspirants are advised to check the complete eligibility criteria before applying.

item.title: UPPSC Computer Assistant Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: The Uttar Pradesh Public Service Commission (UPPSC) has released a notification for the recruitment of Computer Assistant posts in 2025. A total of 13 vacancies have been announced for eligible male and female candidates across India. To apply, candidates must have passed 10+2 (Intermediate) along with either a valid ‚ÄúO‚Äù Level certificate from NIELIT or a Diploma in Computer Science. The minimum age required is 18 years, and selected candidates will receive an initial salary in the ‚Çπ25,500 ‚Äì ‚Çπ81,100 pay scale (Level-4). The application process is online only and will be available soon on the official website uppsc.up.nic.in. Interested candidates are advised to regularly check the website for the release of the online form and notification.

item.title: PFRDA Assistant Manager AM Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: The Pension Fund Regulatory and Development Authority (PFRDA) has released the notification for the recruitment of 40 Assistant Manager (Grade A) posts in various streams including General, Finance, IT, Research, Legal, Actuary, and Official Language. Eligible candidates with qualifications such as Master‚Äôs Degree, BE/B.Tech, LLB, or Chartered Accountancy can apply online. The selection process includes online exams and interviews. Interested candidates are advised to read the official notification carefully before applying.

item.title: SSC Junior Engineer JE Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: The Staff Selection Commission (SSC) has released the notification for the Junior Engineer (JE) Recruitment 2025. The vacancies are available in various departments such as BRO, CPWD, CWC, MES, NTRO, and others for trades including Civil, Electrical, and Mechanical. Candidates must have a Diploma or Degree in the relevant engineering discipline. Some departments also require two years of work experience. The application process is completely online, and the selection will be based on a Computer-Based Test (Paper 1), Paper 2, and Document Verification. This recruitment is open to both male and female candidates across India. Interested applicants can visit the official SSC website https://ssc.gov.in for more details and to apply online.

item.title: BPSC Bihar Special School Teacher 2025 Online Form
IBPS Probationary Officer PO 15th Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: The Institute of Banking Personnel Selection (IBPS) has released the notification for CRP PO/MT-XV Recruitment 2025 for the post of Probationary Officer (PO)/Management Trainee (MT). A total of 5208 vacancies have been announced across 8 participating public sector banks. Candidates who hold a Bachelor‚Äôs Degree in any discipline from a recognized university in India are eligible to apply. The recruitment process includes a preliminary exam, main exam, and interview. Applications must be submitted online through the official IBPS website www.ibps.in. Selected candidates will be appointed across various locations in India.

item.title: IBPS Specialist Officer SO 15th Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: The Institute of Banking Personnel Selection (IBPS) has released the notification for the Specialist Officer (SO) CRP SPL-XV Recruitment 2025. A total of 1007 vacancies have been announced for various Scale I posts including IT Officer, Agriculture Field Officer (AFO), Rajbhasha Adhikari, Law Officer, HR/Personnel Officer, and Marketing Officer. The online application process will be open from 1st July 2025 to 21st July 2025. The Preliminary Examination is scheduled for August 2025, followed by the Main Examination in November 2025. Interviews are likely to be conducted in January/February 2026. Applications will be accepted in online mode only. For more details and to apply, visit the official website www.ibps.in.

item.title: Indian Navy B.Tech Officer Entry Scheme Jan 2026 Batch
item.description: Indian Navy has invited online applications for the 10+2 B.Tech Cadet Entry Scheme (January 2026 Batch). Eligible unmarried male and female candidates who have passed 12th with 70% marks in PCM and 50% in English can apply. Selected candidates will undergo a four-year B.Tech course at the Indian Naval Academy, Ezhimala, Kerala.

item.title: CG Vyapam Peon Bharti 2025 Online Form
item.description: Chhattisgarh Professional Examination Board (CG Vyapam) has released the MLV125 Recruitment 2025 notification for various Group D posts under the Department of Printing and Stationery, Raipur. A total of 19 vacancies are available for positions such as Darkroom Assistant, Pasting Boy, Auxiliary, Inkman/Inker, Junior Binder, Hamal, Sweeper, Watchman, Mortuary Attendant, and Helper. Candidates who have passed 5th or 8th class and possess relevant experience (as per the post) are eligible to apply. Both male and female candidates can submit their applications online through the official website of CG Vyapam. The online application process is open from 27 June 2025 to 25 July 2025. Applicants must ensure to review the official notification carefully and complete the form, including uploading documents and paying the fee online. The written exam is tentatively scheduled for 31 August 2025 at district centers like Raipur, Durg, and Bilaspur.

item.title: HVF Junior Technician Online Form 2025
item.description: Qualification: ITI (NAC/NTC/STC) in relevant trade or Class 10th with 2 years of experience (for some posts)

item.title: JSSC Secondary Teacher 2025 Online Form
Railway RRB Technician 2025 Online Form
item.description: The Railway Recruitment Board (RRB) has released the RRB Technician Recruitment 2025 notification for Technician Grade-1 (Signal) and Technician Grade-3 (Open Line) posts. Around 6238 vacancies will be filled. Grade-1 requires a B.Sc, BE/B.Tech or 3-year diploma in Physics, Electronics, Computer Science, IT, or Instrumentation. Grade-3 requires 10th pass with ITI in relevant trade from NCVT/SCVT. Eligible candidates can apply online. Please read the official notification for full details.

item.title: Rajasthan High Court Class IV (Peon) Vacancy 2025 - Online Form
SSC Multi Tasking Staff MTS Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: Staff Selection Commission (SSC) has released the notification for Multi-Tasking Staff (MTS) and Havaldar Recruitment 2025. Eligible 10th pass candidates can apply online for these posts. The selection includes CBT and Physical Test (for Havaldar). Check complete details including eligibility, age limit, application dates, and how to apply.

item.title: WCDC Bihar Various Post 2025 Online Form
item.description: The Women and Child Development Corporation (WCDC), Bihar has released the WCDC Bihar Various Post Recruitment 2025 notification for a total of 77 contractual vacancies. These include posts like Central Administrator, Case Worker, Para Legal Personnel / Lawyer, Para Medical Personnel, Psycho-Social Counsellor, and Office Assistant (with computer knowledge). Except for the Office Assistant post, all other posts are reserved exclusively for female candidates. Only women who are residents of Bihar are eligible to apply (male/female both can apply for Office Assistant). The application process is completely online and will remain open from 26 June 2025 to 18 July 2025 (up to 6:00 PM). Interested candidates can visit the official website wdc.bihar.gov.in for eligibility, category-wise vacancy details, and to submit their application.

item.title: SSC GD Constable Recruitment 2024, Download Result/Answerkey
item.description: Staff Selection Commission (SSC) has relased General Duty GD Constable Notification 2024. Those candidates who are interested in this SSC GD Constable CAPFs, NIA, SSF and Rifleman (GD) in Assam Rifles Examination,2025 can apply online from Dates 05/09/2024 to 14/10/2024. Read the SSC GD Constable 2024 SSC GD Constable 2024 Exam City Details

item.title: Join Indian Coast Guard Navik/Yantrik CGEPT 2026 Online Form
SBI Probationary Officers PO Bharti 2025 Online Form
item.description: The State Bank of India (SBI) has released the notification for the recruitment of 541 Probationary Officer (PO) posts, including 500 regular posts and 41 backlog posts. Candidates must have a Bachelor‚Äôs degree in any stream from a recognized university in India to be eligible. The category-wise distribution of vacancies is as follows: UR ‚Äì 203, OBC ‚Äì 135, EWS ‚Äì 50, SC ‚Äì 80, and ST ‚Äì 73. The application process will be conducted online through the official SBI website at sbi.co.in. This is a golden opportunity for graduates seeking a prestigious career in banking with SBI.

item.title: RSSB Patwari Bharti 2025 Online Form (Re-Open)
item.description: Rajasthan Staff Selection Board (RSMSSB) has released the notification for Patwari Bharti 2025. A total of 3705 vacancies are available, including 522 posts for TSP areas and 3183 posts for Non-TSP areas. Candidates must have a Bachelor‚Äôs Degree and a recognized Computer qualification such as NIELIT O Level, COPA, RS-CIT, or a Diploma/Degree in Computer Science/Application.

item.title: JPSC Project Manager 2025 Online Form
item.description: JPSC Project Manager Online Form 2025 invites applications from eligible candidates for 30 posts under Jharkhand Public Service Commission. Applicants must have a Bachelor’s Degree in Engineering/Technology or in subjects like Economics, Statistics, Science, Commerce, Cost Accountancy, Sericulture, Food Technology, or Management from a recognized institution. This recruitment is primarily for residents of Jharkhand. The application process is completely online through the official website jpsc.gov.in.

item.description: Rajasthan High Court has officially released the notification for Driver Recruitment 2025, inviting applications for a total of 58 vacancies. Interested and eligible candidates can apply online through the official website hcraj.nic.in from 18 June to 7 July 2025. This recruitment drive offers a great opportunity for candidates seeking government jobs in the driving sector under the Rajasthan judiciary. Applicants are advised to carefully read the eligibility criteria, application process, and important dates mentioned in the official notification before applying.

BPSC Motor Vehicle Inspector MVI Online Form 2025
CG Abkari Aarakshak Bharti 2025 Online Form
item.description: CG Abkari Aarakshak Bharti 2025 invites applications for 200 Excise Constable posts. Eligible candidates who have passed 12th can apply online from June 4 to June 27, 2025. The written exam will be held on July 27, 2025. Applicants from all Indian states can apply, but only Chhattisgarh residents will receive reservation and age relaxation benefits. The recruitment will be conducted by CG Vyapam, and the selection process includes a written test and physical eligibility test.

Join Indian Air Force via AFCAT 2 2025 ‚Äì Apply Now
item.description: Indian Air Force has released the AFCAT 02/2025 notification for the recruitment of Commissioned Officers in Flying and Ground Duty (Technical and Non-Technical) branches. Eligible candidates with a graduate or engineering degree can apply online through the official website. The application process is expected to start in June 2025, with the last date likely in July 2025. The selection will be based on a written exam, AFSB interview, and medical test. Candidates must pay ‚Çπ250 as the application fee. For complete details, visit afcat.cdac.in.
